attributes.action: We require the government to give a full in and out vote on the EU,before the next election
attributes.additional_details:
In view of the new negotiations going on in Europe it is time to stop delaying the inevitable and give the people of this island a proper vote on whether to remain in Europe or not.

The government does not want us to decide for ourselves,but it is time  every UK citizen made an informed decision on the future relationship of this country.

The government option of trying to get powers back from the EU,will leave us in a limbo land of neither being in or out of the club. For the future of our children we must decide before the next election in 2015.

Suppoort this petition and sign it
